mapper.select: select x.rnum, x.product_code, x.product_name, x.detail, x.price, x.area, x.branch, x.service_area, x.star_average, x.sell_num from ( select rownum as rnum, a.product_code, a.product_name, a.detail, a.price, a.area, a.branch, a.service_area, a.star_average, a.sell_num from ( select product_code, product_name, detail, price, area, branch, service_area, star_average, sell_num from product) a where rownum <= 30) x where x.rnum >= 21
